Title: Victory Lap
Writer: Brian Koppelman (created by), David Levien (created by), Andrew Ross Sorkin (created by), Brian Koppelman, David Levien, Alice O'Neill
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, Malin Akerman
Plot: Axe mulls future of Sandicott. Chuck's team discusses their future. Chuck looks to a political future.
